metadata.titleEn: Historical meteorological data of Central Asia (1990 - 2015)
metadata.titleCn: 中亚大湖区气象状况历史数据（1990 - 2015）
metadata.description:
These data contain monthly weather data for the five Central Asian countries every five years from 1990 to 2015. The variables available are average minimum temperature (°C), average maximum temperature (°C) and total precipitation (mm). These data were downscaled from CRU-TS-4.03 by the Climatic Research Unit, University of East Anglia, using WorldClim 2.1 for bias correction.
The average minimum temperature (tmin), average maximum temperature (tmax) and total precipitation (prec) are stored in different folders. The data are all in raster format and stored as TIFF file. The spatial resolution is 2.5 minutes (pixel size is about 21 km^2).
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据包含1990-2015年间每隔五年的中亚五国逐月天气数据，具体包括：平均最低温度（°C），平均最高温度（°C）和总降水量（mm）。本数据由东英吉利大学气候研究中心从CRU-TS-4.03降尺度得到，并使用WorldClim 2.1进行了偏差校正。
平均最低温度（tmin）、平均最高温度（tmax）和总降水量（prec）分别保存在不同文件夹中。数据均为栅格格式，存储为TIFF文件，空间分辨率为2.5弧分（像元大小约21 km^2）。
metadata.instructions:
The average minimum temperature (tmin), average maximum temperature (tmax) and total precipitation (prec) are stored in different folders, named "xxxx_ CA", where xxxx is the abbreviation of data type.
The raster data file in each folder is named "xxxx_ yyyy-mm_ CA.tif", where xxxx is the abbreviation of data type, yyyy is the year, and mm is the month.
The data are in GeoTIFF format, which can be opened by ArcGIS or edited by GDAL.
metadata.instructionsCn:
平均最低温度（tmin）、平均最高温度（tmax）和总降水量（prec）分别保存在不同文件夹中，文件夹命名为“xxxx_CA”，其中xxxx为数据类型缩写。
各文件夹中的栅格数据文件命名为“xxxx_yyyy-mm_CA.tif”，其中xxxx为数据类型缩写，yyyy为年份，mm为月份。
数据均为GeoTIFF格式，可使用ArcGIS打开，也可用GDAL编辑读取。

background: Spatially interpolated gridded climate data, here referred to as 'climate surfaces', are used in many areas of work, particularly in the environmental, agricultural and biological sciences. For many applications, data at a high (≤1km2) spatial resolution are preferred to capture environmental variation that can be lost at lower spatial resolutions, particularly in mountainous and other areas with steep climate gradients. Hijmans et al. (2005) provided climate surfaces, referred to as the ‘WorldClim version 1 database’, for global land areas (excluding Antarctica), consisting of long-term average monthly temperature and precipitation. Over the past decade, there has been an increase in the number of climate stations for which data is available, including a number of stations located at high latitudes and elevations. Furthermore, while the original dataset was limited to monthly precipitation and temperature, we also included solar radiation, wind speed and vapour pressure, which may be necessary to model important processes such as plant growth. Estimates for regions where weather station density (or quality) is insufficient to resolve local gradients may be improved using remotely sensed meteorological data from satellites.
research objective: We also wanted to improve estimates for areas with low station density and in areas with unusual gradients (inversions) and sharp gradients such as rain-shadows or abrupt temperature changes due to ocean-land transitions. We examined the utility of including satellite-derived and other covariables (distance to coast, extraterrestrial solar radiation) for interpolating several climate variables across global land areas.
challenges: The fact that most of our climate surface estimates were only marginally improved by use of satellite covariates highlights the importance of having a dense, high-quality network of climate station data. Prediction error remained high in such regions for all climate variables.
methods: Weather station data were interpolated using thin-plate splines with covariates including elevation, distance to the coast and three satellite-derived covariates: maximum and minimum land surface temperature as well as cloud cover, obtained with the MODIS satellite platform. Interpolation was done for 23 regions of varying size depending on station density. We compiled monthly average climate data for weather stations from a large number of global, regional, national, and local sources, mostly for the 1970–2000 period. Utilizing satellite-derived data and other covariables, we interpolated these data using the thin-plate smoothing spline algorithm implemented in ANUSPLIN and created global climate surfaces for monthly precipitation and minimum, mean, and maximum temperature, solar radiation, wind speed and vapour pressure. Final surfaces were created by selecting only the model with the lowest cross-validation RMSE value for each region, fit to the full dataset.
dataset: We created a new dataset of spatially interpolated monthly climate data for global land areas at a very high spatial resolution (approximately 1km2). We included monthly temperature (minimum, maximum and average), precipitation, solar radiation, vapour pressure and wind speed, aggregated across a target temporal range of 1970–2000, using data from between 9000 and 60000 weather stations.
findings: Global cross-validation correlations were ≥0.99 for temperature and humidity, 0.86 for precipitation and 0.76 for wind speed.
backgroundCn: 空间插值的气候数据，以下简称为“气候表面”，在许多工作领域中被广泛使用，特别是在环境、农业和生物科学领域。对于许多应用而言，较高的空间分辨率（≤1km²）数据更受欢迎，因为它能够捕捉到在较低空间分辨率下可能丢失的环境变化，尤其是在山区和其他气候梯度陡峭的地区。Hijmans等人（2005）提供了气候表面数据，称为“WorldClim版本1数据库”，覆盖全球陆地区域（不包括南极），包含长期平均的月度温度和降水量。在过去十年中，气象站的数据可用性有所增加，包括一些位于高纬度和高海拔地区的气象站。此外，虽然原始数据集仅限于月度降水和温度，但我们还包括了太阳辐射、风速和蒸汽压等数据，这些数据可能对于建模植物生长等重要过程是必要的。对于气象站密度（或质量）不足以解析局部梯度的地区，可以利用来自卫星的遥感气象数据来改善估算。
research objectiveCn: 我们还希望改善低站点密度地区以及存在异常梯度（逆温现象）和急剧梯度（如雨影或由于海洋与陆地过渡引起的温度急剧变化）地区的估计。我们考察了包括卫星衍生和其他协变量（距离海岸的距离、外星太阳辐射）在内的对全球陆地区域多个气候变量进行插值的效用。
challengesCn: 我们气候表面估计的事实表明，使用卫星协变量仅略微改善了结果，这突显了拥有密集、高质量气候站数据网络的重要性。在这些地区，所有气候变量的预测误差仍然很高。
methodsCn: 气象站数据使用薄板样条法进行插值，协变量包括海拔、距离海岸的距离以及三个卫星衍生的协变量：最大和最小地表温度以及云覆盖率，这些数据是通过MODIS卫星平台获得的。插值工作针对23个区域进行，区域大小根据气象站的密度而有所不同。我们汇编了来自大量全球、区域、国家和地方来源的气象站的月平均气候数据，主要涵盖1970年至2000年期间。利用卫星衍生数据和其他协变量，我们使用在ANUSPLIN中实现的薄板平滑样条算法对这些数据进行了插值，并创建了全球气候表面，包括月降水量、最小、平均和最大温度、太阳辐射、风速和蒸气压。最终的表面是通过选择每个区域中交叉验证RMSE值最低的模型，并拟合完整数据集而创建的。
datasetCn: 我们创建了一个新的数据集，包含全球陆地区域的高分辨率（约1平方公里）空间插值月度气候数据。我们包括了1970年至2000年期间的月度温度（最低、最高和平均）、降水量、太阳辐射、蒸汽压和风速，数据来源于9000到60000个气象站的观测。
findingsCn: 全球交叉验证的相关性对于温度和湿度均≥0.99，对于降水量为0.86，对于风速为0.76。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is prediction error for climate surface estimates significantly high in regions with sparse climate station networks?
Verification.QuestionCn: 气候表面估计的预测误差在气候站网络稀疏的地区是否显著较高？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the primary method for interpolating climate data derived from weather stations based on thin-plate splines, kriging, or machine learning algorithms?

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Does the inclusion of satellite-derived covariates like MODIS cloud cover significantly improve climate surface estimates compared to using only ground-based data, or is the improvement marginal?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 卫星衍生的协变量，如MODIS云覆盖，是否显著改善气候表面估计，相较于仅使用地面数据，还是改善幅度较小？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are global climate datasets for monthly variables such as temperature and precipitation primarily constructed using data from a dense network of weather stations, satellite data, or a combination of both?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 全球气候数据集（如温度和降水量的月度变量）主要是通过密集的气象站网络数据、卫星数据或两者的结合来构建的。

Example.AnswerEn: Weather station data were interpolated using thin-plate splines with covariates including elevation, distance to the coast and three satellite-derived covariates: maximum and minimum land surface temperature as well as cloud cover, obtained with the MODIS satellite platform.
Example.AnswerCn: 气象站数据使用薄板样条法进行插值，协变量包括海拔、距离海岸的距离以及三个卫星衍生的协变量：最大和最小地表温度以及云覆盖，均通过MODIS卫星平台获得。

Example.AnswerEn: The fact that most climate surface estimates were only marginally improved by the use of satellite covariates highlights the importance of having a dense, high-quality network of climate station data. Prediction error remained high in regions with insufficient station density for all climate variables.
Example.AnswerCn: 大多数气候表面估计仅通过使用卫星协变量得到了边际改善，这突显了拥有密集、高质量气候站数据网络的重要性。在气候变量不足的地区，预测误差仍然很高。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a dataset that provides spatially interpolated climate data including temperature and precipitation for global land areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据集的例子，该数据集提供全球陆地区域的空间插值气候数据，包括温度和降水量？
Example.AnswerEn: A new dataset of spatially interpolated monthly climate data for global land areas at a very high spatial resolution (approximately 1km2) was created, which includes monthly temperature (minimum, maximum, and average), precipitation, solar radiation, vapour pressure, and wind speed, aggregated across a target temporal range of 1970–2000, using data from between 9000 and 60000 weather stations.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个新的全球陆地区域的高分辨率（约1km²）空间插值月度气候数据集被创建，包含1970年至2000年期间的月度温度（最低、最高和平均）、降水量、太阳辐射、蒸汽压和风速，数据来源于9000到60000个气象站的观测数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key characteristics of the spatially interpolated climate data used in this domain?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在该领域中，空间插值气候数据的关键特征包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: high spatial resolution, ≤1km², long-term average monthly temperature, precipitation, solar radiation, wind speed, vapor pressure
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 高空间分辨率，≤1km²，长期平均月温度、降水量、太阳辐射、风速、蒸汽压。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What methodological features are involved in the interpolation of climate data in this field?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在该领域中，气候数据插值涉及哪些方法论特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: weather station data, thin-plate splines, covariates such as elevation, distance to the coast, satellite-derived metrics like land surface temperature and cloud cover, ANUSPLIN algorithm, lowest cross-validation RMSE value, global climate surfaces
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 气象站数据，薄板样条，协变量如海拔、到海岸的距离、卫星衍生指标如地表温度和云量，ANUSPLIN算法，最低交叉验证RMSE值，全球气候表面。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'spatially interpolated gridded climate data' in the context of environmental sciences?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在环境科学的背景下，“空间插值网格气候数据”是指通过空间插值方法生成的气候数据，这些数据以网格形式呈现，能够在不同地点和时间上提供气候变量的估计值。
Definition.AnswerEn: Spatially interpolated gridded climate data, also referred to as 'climate surfaces,' are datasets used in various fields like environmental, agricultural, and biological sciences. They are designed to capture environmental variations, especially in areas with steep climate gradients, by using data at high spatial resolutions, often ≤1km².
Definition.AnswerCn: 空间插值的网格气候数据，也称为“气候表面”，是用于环境、农业和生物科学等多个领域的数据集。它们旨在捕捉环境变化，特别是在气候梯度陡峭的地区，通过使用高空间分辨率的数据，通常为≤1km²。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with creating climate datasets for areas with low weather station density?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在气象站密度较低的地区创建气候数据集面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Creating climate datasets for areas with low weather station density presents challenges such as maintaining prediction accuracy. Despite using satellite-derived covariates, prediction errors remain high due to insufficient station density and quality, which highlights the importance of having a dense, high-quality network of climate station data.
Definition.AnswerCn: 为低气象站密度地区创建气候数据集面临挑战，例如保持预测准确性。尽管使用了卫星衍生的协变量，但由于气象站的密度和质量不足，预测误差仍然很高，这突显了拥有密集且高质量的气候站数据网络的重要性。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the role of thin-plate splines in climate data interpolation?
Definition.QuestionCn: 薄板样条在气候数据插值中的作用是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: In climate data interpolation, thin-plate splines are used to interpolate weather station data by incorporating covariates such as elevation, distance to the coast, and satellite-derived variables. This method is used to create climate surfaces for variables like temperature, precipitation, and wind speed by fitting models to the data with the lowest cross-validation RMSE values.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在气候数据插值中，薄板样条被用来通过引入协变量（如海拔、距离海岸的距离和卫星衍生变量）来插值气象站数据。这种方法用于创建气候表面，变量包括温度、降水量和风速，通过拟合模型以获得最低的交叉验证均方根误差（RMSE）值。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do satellite-derived covariates compare to traditional weather station data in terms of improving the accuracy of climate surface estimates?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 卫星衍生的协变量与传统气象站数据相比，在提高气候表面估计的准确性方面如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Satellite-derived covariates, while useful, only marginally improved climate surface estimates compared to traditional weather station data. The importance of a dense, high-quality network of climate station data was highlighted, as prediction error remained high in regions with low station density for all climate variables.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生的协变量虽然有用，但与传统气象站数据相比，仅在边际上改善了气候表面估计。研究强调了高密度、高质量气候站数据网络的重要性，因为在气象站密度低的地区，所有气候变量的预测误差仍然很高。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of interpolation in areas with low station density differ when using thin-plate splines versus satellite-derived data?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在站点密度较低的区域，使用薄板样条插值与卫星衍生数据时，插值面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Interpolation challenges in areas with low station density are significant for both methods. Using thin-plate splines with covariates such as elevation and distance to coast, prediction errors remain high in these regions. Similarly, while satellite-derived data are utilized, they only marginally improve estimates, highlighting the difficulty in resolving local gradients without a dense network of stations.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在站点密度较低的地区，插值挑战对两种方法都是显著的。使用薄板样条法结合诸如海拔和距离海岸等协变量，预测误差在这些地区仍然很高。同样，尽管利用卫星衍生数据，但仅能略微改善估计，突显了在没有密集站点网络的情况下解决局部梯度的困难。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the implications of using a high spatial resolution (approximately 1 km²) for global climate datasets in terms of capturing environmental variations?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用高空间分辨率（大约1平方公里）全球气候数据集的影响在于捕捉环境变化的能力。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Using a high spatial resolution for global climate datasets allows for capturing environmental variations that might be lost at lower resolutions, particularly in areas with steep climate gradients such as mountainous regions. This can improve the modeling of important processes like plant growth by providing more detailed climate information.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用高空间分辨率的全球气候数据集可以捕捉到在低分辨率下可能丢失的环境变化，特别是在气候梯度陡峭的地区，如山区。这可以通过提供更详细的气候信息来改善重要过程的建模，例如植物生长。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the high prediction error in estimating climate variables in regions with sparse weather station data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致在气象站数据稀疏地区估计气候变量时预测误差较高的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The high prediction error in estimating climate variables in regions with sparse weather station data is primarily due to the lack of a dense, high-quality network of climate station data. In such regions, even the inclusion of satellite covariates only marginally improves climate surface estimates, highlighting the challenge of resolving local gradients with insufficient data.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在气象站数据稀疏的地区，气候变量估计的高预测误差主要是由于缺乏密集、高质量的气候站网络。在这些地区，即使加入卫星协变量也仅能略微改善气候表面估计，突显了在数据不足的情况下解决局部梯度的挑战。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it important to include satellite-derived covariables when interpolating climate data for areas with unusual climate gradients?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在对具有特殊气候梯度的地区进行气候数据插值时，包含卫星衍生的协变量是重要的，因为它们可以提供更准确和细致的气候信息。这些协变量能够反映地表特征、植被覆盖、土壤类型等因素，这些因素会影响气候变化的模式和强度，从而提高插值结果的可靠性和精确性。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Including satellite-derived covariables is important when interpolating climate data for areas with unusual climate gradients because these covariables can potentially improve estimates in regions where weather station density is insufficient or where there are sharp gradients, such as rain-shadows or abrupt temperature changes due to ocean-land transitions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在对气候数据进行插值时，包含卫星衍生的协变量非常重要，因为这些协变量可以在气象站密度不足或存在明显气候梯度的地区（例如雨影区或由于海洋与陆地过渡引起的突变温度）改善估计。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the inclusion of additional climate variables like solar radiation and wind speed to be necessary for certain environmental modeling processes?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在某些环境建模过程中，包含额外的气候变量如太阳辐射和风速是必要的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The inclusion of additional climate variables like solar radiation and wind speed is necessary for certain environmental modeling processes because these variables are crucial for accurately modeling important processes such as plant growth. Without these variables, models may fail to capture the full range of environmental and climatic factors influencing such processes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在某些环境建模过程中，加入额外的气候变量，如太阳辐射和风速是必要的，因为这些变量对于准确建模植物生长等重要过程至关重要。如果没有这些变量，模型可能无法捕捉到影响这些过程的全部环境和气候因素。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using satellite-derived covariates on the accuracy of climate variable interpolation in regions with low weather station density?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用卫星衍生协变量对低气象站密度地区气候变量插值准确性的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using satellite-derived covariates in regions with low weather station density may not significantly improve the accuracy of climate variable interpolation. The importance of having a dense, high-quality network of climate station data is highlighted, as prediction error remains high for all climate variables in such regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在气象站密度较低的地区，使用卫星衍生的协变量可能不会显著提高气候变量插值的准确性。强调了拥有密集且高质量的气候站数据网络的重要性，因为在这些地区，所有气候变量的预测误差仍然很高。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the spatial resolution of a dataset affect the ability to capture environmental variations in mountainous regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 数据集的空间分辨率如何影响捕捉山区环境变化的能力？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: A higher spatial resolution (≤1km2) is preferred to capture environmental variations in mountainous regions, as lower spatial resolutions may lose important environmental details due to steep climate gradients.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在山区，由于陡峭的气候梯度，较高的空间分辨率（≤1km²）更受欢迎，以捕捉环境变化，因为较低的空间分辨率可能会丢失重要的环境细节。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary goal of interpolating weather station data using thin-plate splines with covariates for climate research?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用薄板样条和协变量插值气象站数据的主要目标是为气候研究提供更准确的空间气候变量估计。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal is to improve estimates for areas with low station density and in areas with unusual gradients and sharp gradients such as rain-shadows or abrupt temperature changes due to ocean-land transitions by using covariates, including elevation, distance to the coast, and satellite-derived data.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是通过使用协变量，包括海拔、距离海岸的距离和卫星衍生数据，来改善低站点密度地区以及由于雨影或海洋-陆地过渡引起的异常梯度和急剧梯度地区的估计。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to create spatially interpolated climate datasets with high spatial resolution for global land areas?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 创建具有高空间分辨率的全球陆地区域空间插值气候数据集的重要性在于：
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important to create these datasets to capture environmental variation that can be lost at lower spatial resolutions, especially in mountainous and other areas with steep climate gradients, which is necessary for many applications in environmental, agricultural, and biological sciences.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 创建这些数据集以捕捉环境变化是重要的，因为在较低空间分辨率下，这些变化可能会丢失，尤其是在山区和其他具有陡峭气候梯度的地区。这对于环境、农业和生物科学的许多应用都是必要的。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can satellite-derived data be utilized to improve the accuracy of climate variable interpolation in regions with low station density?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 卫星获取的数据如何用于提高低站点密度地区气候变量插值的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Satellite-derived data can be integrated as covariates in interpolation processes. For example, maximum and minimum land surface temperature and cloud cover from the MODIS satellite platform can be utilized alongside other covariates like elevation and distance to coast. These are used in thin-plate spline interpolation to enhance estimates in regions with sparse weather station data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生数据可以作为协变量集成到插值过程中。例如，可以利用MODIS卫星平台的最大和最小地表温度以及云覆盖率，结合其他协变量如海拔和距离海岸的距离。这些数据用于薄板样条插值，以增强在气象站数据稀疏地区的估计。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in generating high-resolution climate surfaces from weather station data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 生成高分辨率气候表面所涉及的程序步骤包括以下内容：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Weather station data are interpolated using thin-plate splines with various covariates such as elevation, distance to the coast, and satellite-derived data. The interpolation is performed for multiple regions, and monthly average climate data from diverse sources are compiled. The ANUSPLIN algorithm is then applied, and the best model with the lowest cross-validation RMSE is selected for final surface creation, producing high-resolution global climate surfaces.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 气象站数据使用薄板样条法进行插值，考虑了多种协变量，如海拔、距离海岸的距离和卫星衍生数据。插值在多个区域进行，并汇编来自不同来源的月平均气候数据。然后应用ANUSPLIN算法，选择具有最低交叉验证均方根误差（RMSE）的最佳模型进行最终表面创建，生成高分辨率的全球气候表面。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are employed to validate the accuracy of climate data interpolation across global land areas?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于验证全球陆地区域气候数据插值准确性的方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Cross-validation is used to assess the accuracy of climate data interpolation. This involves evaluating the model's predictive performance by partitioning the dataset and comparing predicted values against actual observed data. For instance, global cross-validation correlations for temperature were found to be ≥0.99, indicating high accuracy in interpolation.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 交叉验证用于评估气候数据插值的准确性。这涉及通过对数据集进行分区来评估模型的预测性能，并将预测值与实际观测数据进行比较。例如，全球交叉验证的温度相关性发现≥0.99，表明插值的高准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods enable the improvement of climate data accuracy in regions with low weather station density?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法可以提高气候数据在气象站密度低的地区的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Utilizing satellite-derived data and other covariables, such as elevation and distance to the coast, enables the interpolation of climate variables using algorithms like thin-plate smoothing splines, which can improve estimates in areas with low station density.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 利用卫星衍生数据和其他协变量，如海拔和距离海岸的距离，可以使用薄板平滑样条等算法对气候变量进行插值，从而改善低站点密度地区的估计。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions are necessary for creating high-resolution climate surfaces for global land areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 创建全球陆地区域高分辨率气候表面所需的条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: A dense, high-quality network of climate station data is crucial for creating high-resolution climate surfaces, as it significantly affects the accuracy of the interpolated climate variables. Additionally, the use of satellite-derived data and covariables is necessary to enhance predictions in regions where station data is sparse.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 密集的高质量气候站数据网络对于创建高分辨率气候表面至关重要，因为它显著影响插值气候变量的准确性。此外，使用卫星衍生数据和协变量也是必要的，以增强在气象站数据稀缺地区的预测能力。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it expected that using satellite-derived covariates could improve climate surface estimates in areas with low station density?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么预计使用卫星衍生的协变量可以改善低站点密度地区的气候表面估计？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Satellite-derived covariates, such as land surface temperature and cloud cover obtained from platforms like MODIS, are expected to provide additional data points that help to refine climate estimates where traditional weather stations are sparse. This approach aims to capture environmental variations that might be missed due to the low density of ground-based stations, potentially improving the accuracy of climate surface estimates.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生的协变量，如从MODIS平台获取的地表温度和云覆盖，预计将提供额外的数据点，帮助在传统气象站稀少的地方细化气候估计。这种方法旨在捕捉由于地面站点密度低而可能被遗漏的环境变化，从而潜在地提高气候表面估计的准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why could the inclusion of additional climate variables like solar radiation and wind speed be necessary for modeling certain environmental processes?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在建模某些环境过程时，纳入额外的气候变量如太阳辐射和风速是必要的？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Including additional climate variables such as solar radiation and wind speed is necessary for modeling environmental processes like plant growth, which are influenced by a comprehensive range of meteorological conditions. These variables provide a more complete picture of the climate and can improve the accuracy of models that rely on understanding how temperature, precipitation, and other factors interact in various ecological and agricultural contexts.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 包括太阳辐射和风速等额外气候变量对于建模植物生长等环境过程是必要的，因为这些过程受到一系列气象条件的综合影响。这些变量提供了更全面的气候图景，可以提高依赖于理解温度、降水和其他因素在各种生态和农业背景下相互作用的模型的准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the effectiveness of using satellite-derived covariates for improving climate variable interpolation accuracy in regions with low station density?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对使用卫星衍生协变量提高低站点密度地区气候变量插值准确性的有效性进行评估。
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of satellite-derived covariates only marginally improved climate surface estimates, highlighting the importance of having a dense, high-quality network of climate station data. Prediction error remained high in regions with low station density for all climate variables.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生的协变量仅在一定程度上改善了气候表面估计，突显了拥有密集、高质量气候站数据网络的重要性。在气候变量较少的地区，预测误差仍然很高。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you assess the potential of incorporating additional climate variables like solar radiation and wind speed into existing climate datasets to enhance their applicability for environmental modeling?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估将额外的气候变量如太阳辐射和风速纳入现有气候数据集的潜力，以增强其在环境建模中的适用性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Incorporating additional climate variables such as solar radiation and wind speed can enhance the applicability of climate datasets for modeling important processes like plant growth, although it may require a high-density network of climate stations to resolve local gradients effectively.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 纳入额外的气候变量，如太阳辐射和风速，可以增强气候数据集在建模重要过程（如植物生长）中的适用性，尽管这可能需要高密度的气候站网络来有效地解析地方梯度。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can’t make sense of why high spatial resolution data is preferred for modeling climate surfaces, especially in areas with steep climate gradients.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么在气候梯度陡峭的地区，高空间分辨率的数据更适合用于气候表面的建模。
Assertion.AnswerEn: High spatial resolution data is preferred because it can capture environmental variations that might be lost at lower resolutions, which is crucial in areas with steep climate gradients where changes in temperature and precipitation can occur over short distances.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 高空间分辨率数据更受欢迎，因为它能够捕捉到在较低分辨率下可能丢失的环境变化，这在气候梯度陡峭的地区尤为重要，因为在短距离内温度和降水的变化可能会发生。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the data collection methods and interpolation techniques used to generate high-resolution climate surfaces for the Central Asian large lake region.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结用于生成中亚大湖区高分辨率气候表面的数据收集方法和插值技术。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Weather station data were interpolated using thin-plate splines with covariates including elevation, distance to the coast, and three satellite-derived covariates: maximum and minimum land surface temperature as well as cloud cover, obtained with the MODIS satellite platform. Interpolation was done for 23 regions of varying size depending on station density. Utilizing satellite-derived data and other covariables, the thin-plate smoothing spline algorithm implemented in ANUSPLIN was used to create global climate surfaces for monthly precipitation and minimum, mean, and maximum temperature, solar radiation, wind speed, and vapour pressure.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 气象站数据使用薄板样条法进行插值，协变量包括海拔、距离海岸的距离以及三个卫星衍生的协变量：最大和最小地表温度以及云覆盖，数据来自MODIS卫星平台。插值工作针对23个区域进行，区域大小根据气象站的密度而有所不同。利用卫星衍生数据和其他协变量，使用ANUSPLIN中实现的薄板平滑样条算法创建了全球气候表面，涵盖了每月降水量、最小、平均和最大温度、太阳辐射、风速和蒸汽压。
